titles.title: SOIL Act
SOIL Act
Support for Ownership and Investment in Land Act

To establish a pilot program to establish a pre-approval process for direct farm ownership loans made under subtitle A of the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act in order to streamline the application process and provide greater certainty to borrowers.

bill.summary:
Support for Ownership and Investment in Land Act or the SOIL Act
This bill directs the Farm Service Agency (FSA) to carry out a pilot program to establish a pre-approval process for Direct Farm Ownership Loans. As background, the FSA Direct Loan Program provides Farm Ownership Loans to farmers and ranchers for the purchase and development of farm property.
